meanings.definition: A pair of small speakers worn over the ears to listen to audio from a computer, music player, etc.
meanings.sent1: I put on my headphone to listen to my favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her headphone with her to enjoy music on the go.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the headphone, thinking it was a fancy collar.
meanings.sent4: His headphone was a gateway to a world of melodies and beats.
meanings.sent5: The headphone whispered sweet tunes directly into his ears.

meanings.definition: A single speaker worn over one ear for listening to audio from a computer, music player, etc.
meanings.sent1: He used the headphone to focus on the audio in his left ear.
meanings.sent2: The lightweight headphone was comfortable to wear during workouts.
meanings.sent3: The headphone felt lonely without its pair and wished for a friend.
meanings.sent4: Her headphone was like a secret agent, delivering sound discreetly.
meanings.sent5: The headphone hummed a soft melody, creating a personal soundtrack.
